#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 string s;
 string  rs;
 int memo[12][12];
 int DP(int x,int y)
 {

     if(x>=y)return true ;
     if(memo[x][y]!=-1)return memo[x][y];
     int ans= 0 ;
     int found = rs.find(s.substr(x,y-x+1));
   // cout << s.substr(x,y-x+1)<<endl;
     if(found>=0){
     if(DP(x+1,y) && DP(x,y-1))ans = 1;
     else ans =  0;
     }
     memo[x][y] = ans ;
     return ans ;
 }
main()
{
    int test ;
    cin >> test ;
    while(test--)
    {
        cin >> s ;
        rs.clear();
        int i=0;
        for (string::reverse_iterator rit=s.rbegin(); rit!=s.rend(); ++rit)
                                rs.push_back(*rit);
        //cout << rs << endl;
        for(int i=0;i<=10;i++){
            for(int j=0;j<=10;j++)memo[i][j]=-1;
        }
        if(DP(0,s.size()-1) )cout << "YES\n";
        else cout << "NO\n";
    }
}
